jdbcService.sql: select distinct r.name, n.name as context from ~roles r join ~group_roles gr on r.id = gr.role_id join ~user_groups ug on ug.group_id = gr.group_id left outer join ~nodes n on n.id = r.owner_id and n.component_id = (select id from ~components where name='context') where ug.user_id = any(:userId) and (:current is null or ( ug.started is not null and ug.started <= :current and (ug.stopped is null or ug.stopped > :current) and gr.started is not null and gr.started <= :current and (gr.stopped is null or gr.stopped > :current) ))
